name: NullStar
description:
Our hero awakens with the need to run, but why? Get to the end of this finite runner to unlock the mystery and our hero's full potential.

NO ADS! NullStar is free with no ads, no daily rewards, no meaningless trinkets. Just retro arcade-style action. Turn on the "Retro Mode" filter for a true classic arcade monitor experience, turn it off for crisp pixel-perfect graphics.

Original soundtrack by chiptune kingpin Saskrotch (https://saskrotch.bandcamp.com/)

Can you complete this finite runner? Test your arcade skills with NullStar. Death resets your progress, but unlocked power-ups are retained. The more you play and the farther you get, the better chance you have of getting to the end!
